name: Bonespitter
description: The Bonespitter is a gargantuan monstrosity with a durable bony exterior and a frighteningly large maw, capable of delivering devastating bite and piercing attacks.
memorable: Its ability to swallow opponents whole and restrain them with its bone spikes makes the Bonespitter a terrifying foe in combat.
goals: The Bonespitter thrives on causing damage and restraining opponents to control the battlefield.
relations: It may be encountered in areas with other brutal predators, or as a servant to more intelligent monstrosities that utilize its strength.
environment: Typically found in rugged terrains, caves, or locales where it can ambush unsuspecting prey.
strengths: Its high strength allows it to deal massive damage with both melee and ranged attacks, making it a significant threat.
weaknesses: Slow movement due to low dexterity makes it easy to evade, and reliance on brute force rather than finesse.
attacks: The Bonespitter uses a fearsome bite attack that can swallow opponents, and bone spikes to both injure and restrain its enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Shard Spray, which allows it to exhale a cone of bone shards that can severely damage and restrain multiple targets.
senses: It possesses blindsight up to 30 feet and tremorsense up to 60 feet, giving it the ability to perceive its surroundings without relying on sight.
additional_information: High Constitution grants it effective saving throw bonuses against damaging effects.
Bony Body ability creates an area of danger, punishing those who get too close.
Can restrain large or smaller creatures it attacks, limiting their mobility.
The bone spikes it uses can also be removed or destroyed by contestants, adding a layer of tactical play.
A high challenge rating makes it a memorable encounter for adventurers.
